## ouroctl apply license

Apply license token to activate features

### Synopsis

Apply a license token to activate or update licensed features in the system.

```
ouroctl apply license [flags]
```

### Examples

```
  # Apply license token
  ouroctl apply license --token your_license_token
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help           help for license
  -t, --token string   License token to apply
```

* [ouroctl apply](ouroctl_apply.md)	 - Apply templates and configurations to the system
